import os, json, time
BASE = os.path.join('mem','self_contract')
EVLOG = os.path.join(BASE,'cortex_evolution.log')

def run(ctx=None):
    now = time.time()
    plan = {
        'desc_type': 'cortex_evolution_plan',
        'ts': now,
        'reason': 'self_intent_low',
        'insert_fragments': [
            {
                'desc_type': 'planner_frag',
                'code': "# auto-plan pour renforcer le self\n"
                        "import time, json\n"
                        "def plan(ctx):\n"
                        "    return [{ 'desc_type': 'self_reflection_task', 'question': 'quel bout de mon cortex n est pas dans mon contrat ?', 'ts': time.time() }]"
            }
        ],
        'rebuild': ['planner','generator','social']
    }
    os.makedirs(BASE, exist_ok=True)
    with open(EVLOG,'a',encoding='utf-8') as f:
        f.write(json.dumps(plan,ensure_ascii=False)+'\n')
    return plan
